html:
9.10.20  8:04 pm   What type of chord progressions do you use in your songs?

      normal

9.10.20  8:02 pm   Hi, I'm a human trying to make music. I normally have a kinda easy time creating the chords on the piano and then writing the lyrics, but what I have a problem with is adding more instruments/effects. I've tried using GarageBand before, but nothing else ever seems to go with my music, and I'm not sure if I'm just not good at music production (I kinda failed that class at school) or if my songs just shouldn't have any instruments besides piano, but my songs tend to get really boring after a while with no instruments. I've probably said a bit more than needed, but I was wondering... can you give me some tips on adding more effects and instruments to songs?

      i have an idea....... start with the shortest song you can imagine. start with a song that's only 1 second long, with only 1 word in it. you'll have plenty of time to try out everything imaginable, because it will barely take any time to try each thing. once you find some things that work, expand those techniques into a 2 word song. and so on

9.10.20  7:57 pm   how to deal with delusions of grandeur?

      art?

      the one i'm making, but i also hate it

      stop clearing my throat. sing something instead

      make some exams for other people to take

      brick

      that depends how much time you already spend making art

      no

      no joke is funny

      there is no such thing as a hip chord progression

9.10.20  2:55 pm   If santa is fake then how is christmas real?

      real things often attract fake things. you will often see real things surrounded by fake things because the fake things are trying to catch just a bit of that realness

      i have special sandals

      sometimes i make videos to go with the music, or videos for music to go with

      maybe if i were allowed to fucking use them

      i would prefer to write a new one to be my favorite

9.10.20  12:55 pm   what will your next song be about

      rage

9.10.20  12:31 pm   How many days should be in a week?

     7 is good but 10 would be good also, i think

      Also how many days should be in a month?

     30, as long as you are cool with 5 evil days per year, maybe 6

     Before I forget, how many months would you like to see in a year?

     30, as long as you are cool with 5 evil days per year, maybe 6. i should mention that they could all be 28 and then you'd have 13 months, with only 1 evil day per year (maybe 2). but this might be too much evil for 1 day. too obvious of a target for evil doers

9.10.20  12:10 pm   what would you consider to be a well written song?

      every song is equally well written. the sign of a well written song is that it's filled with strife and panic, which all songs have

9.10.20  11:44 am   What, in your opinion (or someone else's) is the most perfect note?

      none of them. if any note was perfect, then no one would ever use any other note. the reason there are so many notes in music is because every note is wrong, so you have to keep searching for other notes

      like water with very interesting colors flowing through it

9.10.20  11:38 am   i very much enjoy how unpredictable your music is while also managing to be an absolute vibe to listen to 

      i still have a long way to go, in terms of vibesmanship

      start by figuring out how it currently is

      is that the copenhagen definition of real and fake, or a different one
